title: Dryad Parameters
description: Dryad is a pipeline to construct reference free core-genome or SNP phylogenetic trees for examining prokaryote relatedness in outbreaks.

snp_reference.description: reference sequence used for the SNP pipeline (optional)

reads.description: directory containing gz reads in fastq/fq format

name_split_on.description: character to split sequencing names, useful for shorten sequencing result identifiers

qualitytrimscore.description: quality score used for bbduk trimming, default: 10

minlength.description: minimum length of a passing read, default: 10

roary_mafft.description: Use mafft for core-genome alignment, setting to false switches to PRANK, default: true

cg_tree_model.description: subsititution model used for creating the phylogenetic tree, default: 'GTR+G'

test.description: set to true to test the workflow using sequences from NCBI

test_snp.description: test the SNP pipeline when performing a workflow test, default: true
